sn22.80:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
sn22.80:4.2: Atha kho bhagavā kismiñcideva pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇāmetvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kapilavatthuṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.80:4.3: Kapilavatthusmiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena mahāvanaṃ tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
sn22.80:4.4: Mahāvanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
sn22.80:5.1: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.80:5.3: Santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ.
sn22.80:5.4: Tesaṃ mamaṃ apassantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:5.5: Seyyathāpi nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṃ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:5.6: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ tesaṃ mamaṃ apassantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:5.7: Seyyathāpi nāma bījānaṃ taruṇānaṃ udakaṃ alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:5.9: tesaṃ mamaṃ alabhantānaṃ dassanāya siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:5.10: Yannūnāhaṃ yatheva mayā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito, evameva etarahi anuggaṇheyyaṃ bhikkhusaṅghan”ti.
sn22.80:6.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—
sn22.80:6.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
sn22.80:6.5: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.80:6.8: Santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ.
sn22.80:6.9: Tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ apassantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:6.10: Seyyathāpi nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṃ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:6.11: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ apassantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:6.12: Seyyathāpi nāma bījānaṃ taruṇānaṃ udakaṃ alabhantānaṃ siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:6.13: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, tesaṃ bhagavantaṃ alabhantānaṃ dassanāya siyā aññathattaṃ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:6.16: Yatheva bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṃgho anuggahito, evameva etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṃghan”ti.
sn22.80:7.2: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
sn22.80:8.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena nigrodhārāmo tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.80:8.3: Nisajja kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi yathā te bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkameyyuṃ.
sn22.80:8.4: Tepi bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.80:8.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.80:9.2: Abhisāpoyaṃ, bhikkhave, lokasmiṃ piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇīti.
sn22.80:9.3: Tañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṃ paṭicca;
sn22.80:9.4: neva rājābhinītā, na corābhinītā, na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā;
sn22.80:9.5: api ca kho otiṇṇāmha jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇā dukkhaparetā appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
sn22.80:10.2: So ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
sn22.80:10.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, chavālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ, neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharati, nāraññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharati.
sn22.80:10.4: Tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi gihibhogā ca parihīno, sāmaññatthañca na paripūreti.
sn22.80:11.3: Ime ca bhikkhave, tayo akusalavitakkā kva aparisesā nirujjhanti?
sn22.80:11.4: Catūsu vā satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato animittaṃ vā samādhiṃ bhāvayato.
sn22.80:11.5: Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, alameva animitto samādhi bhāvetuṃ.
sn22.80:11.6: Animitto, bhikkhave, samādhi bhāvito bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso.
sn22.80:12.3: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
sn22.80:12.4: ‘atthi nu kho taṃ kiñci lokasmiṃ yamahaṃ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assan’ti?
sn22.80:12.6: ‘natthi nu kho taṃ kiñci lokasmiṃ yamahaṃ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assaṃ.
sn22.80:12.10: Tassa me assa upādānapaccayā bhavo;
sn22.80:13.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.80:13.3: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.80:13.5: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
